TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IContractBehaviorAttribute

summary.span: 指定合約，其中實作 介面的屬性為作用中。

span.span: Specifies the contract for which an attribute that implements the interface is active.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在也是 物件的屬性 (Attribute) 上實作 介面，以在服務型別上啟用該合約行為屬性 (Attribute)，但將其應用程式限制為在 屬性 (Property) 中指定的合約。Implement the interface on an attribute that is also an object to enable the use of that contract behavior attribute on a service type but restrict its application to the contract specified in the property. 在自訂合約行為屬性 (Attribute) 上實作 並沒有需求，且如果屬性 (Attribute) 套用至合約介面或雙工回呼類別，便會忽略 屬性 (Property) 的值。There is no requirement to implement on custom contract behavior attributes, and if the attribute is applied either to a contract interface or to a duplex callback class the value of the property is ignored. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例假設自訂的 實作呼叫提供「單一」行為的 `ObjectProviderBehavior`，並一律傳回相同的服務執行個體，而且不會加以回收。The following code example assumes a custom implementation called `ObjectProviderBehavior` that provides a "singleton" behavior; it always returns the same service instance and does not recycle it. 如果要插入執行個體提供者自訂，此範例會示範如何實作自訂屬性 (`SingletonBehaviorAttribute`)，該屬性會實作 以插入自訂服務執行個體提供者。To insert the instance provider customization, the example shows how to implement a custom attribute (`SingletonBehaviorAttribute`) that implements to insert the custom service instance provider. 它也會實作 ，繫結其應用程式與 `ISampleService` 合約。It also implements , which binds its application to the `ISampleService` contract. [!code-csharp[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/cs/objectproviderbehavior.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/vb/objectproviderbehavior.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetContract As Type
public: property Type ^ TargetContract { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得合約行為適用的合約的型別。

span.span: Gets the type of the contract to which the contract behavior is applicable.
The contract to which the contract behavior is applicable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以實作 屬性 (Property)，以指定當實作的 屬性 (Attribute) 套用至服務類別時，套用合約行為的合約。Implement the property to specify the contract to which the contract behavior is applied when the implementing attribute is applied to a service class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例假設自訂的 實作呼叫提供「單一」行為的 `ObjectProviderBehavior`，並一律傳回相同的服務執行個體，而且不會加以回收。The following code example assumes a custom implementation called `ObjectProviderBehavior` that provides a "singleton" behavior; it always returns the same service instance and does not recycle it. 如果要插入執行個體提供者自訂，此範例會示範如何實作自訂屬性 (`SingletonBehaviorAttribute`)，該屬性會實作 以插入自訂服務執行個體提供者。To insert the instance provider customization, the example shows how to implement a custom attribute (`SingletonBehaviorAttribute`) that implements to insert the custom service instance provider. 它也會實作 ，繫結其應用程式與 `ISampleService` 合約。It also implements , which binds its application to the `ISampleService` contract. [!code-csharp[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/cs/objectproviderbehavior.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/vb/objectproviderbehavior.vb#2)]
